args:
set -u
set -e
set -x

export PATH=$PATH:/root/google-cloud-sdk/bin
gcloud source repos clone tf2-api-tests --project=xl-ml-test
cd tf2-api-tests
pip3 install behave
behave -e ipynb_checkpoints --tags=-fails --tags=-failspod -i custom_layers_model
containers.name: train
